dialogue.text: A pal of mine just finished his set.
Uh... do I really have to?
He looks so cool, he won't want to talk to me...
Jeez, you're always beating yourself up...
Come on now, you gotta make that band somehow!
*Guide leads you toward the stage, where a short, stylish figure is adjusting the knobs on a keyboard.*
Hey, Keebs! Key-Blur! The Mini Midi Master!
